PROMPT_DESCRIPTION: Generates a traditional limerick, optionally parameterised with a protagonist and place of origin.
SUCCESS_CRITERIA: The output is a five-line limerick.
The rhythm broadly matches a traditional limerick.
If PROTAGONIST is provided, it is used naturally in the first line.
If ORIGIN is provided, it is used naturally in the first line.
OUTPUT_SPEC: Return the limerick as plain text with exactly five lines.
